The best carrot cake I've ever had.  My wife doesn't even like carrot cake and she fought me for the last bite.  That should tell you something!  The cake had the right balance of icing, perfect density, and not overdone on the carrots or raisins.  Just perfect.  It's a cozy little shop with a few tables and two very friendly owners.  It didn't hurt that they spoke perfect English either!  The cake variety changes daily, but the carrot is their specialty.  Give it a try with a nice espresso and remember that if you are lucky enough to live in Barcelona, it doesn't have to be your last piece!
